response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored to exceed expectations and bring unparalleled benefits to its owner. Given its extraordinary quality and features, we are extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. We believe this is an opportunity not only to own a remarkable piece but also to secure significant savings compared to market rates. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.", "product_price": 950000}
